title: Celeriac and apple coleslaw
directions: Grate the carrots and thinly slice the red cabbage, celeriac and onions, adding to a large bowl as you go. Add the garlic.
Grate the apple and add to the bowl, squeezing lemon juice over it to stop it browning, and mix all the above together.
Add Heinz [Seriously] Good Mayonnaise and stir through to bind the vegetables.
Garnish with chopped parsley and (if you like) lemon juice for some acidity.
ingredients: 1 garlic clove, crushed to a paste
1 small bunch of curly parsley, chopped finely
